notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: JLH, FYT and FCZ designed the study. XCW and JLH designed the questionnaires. NZ and WZZ analysed epidemiologic data. YFQ and ZFL tested the serum samples. LY, HPL, JKL and JL conducted fields sampling and collated the data throughout this study. CJB contributed to interpreting the results. XCW and WQS wrote the manuscript and analysed the results. XCW and WQS contributed equally in this study. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
